text: The 1905 Copa del Rey Final was the third final of the Copa del Rey, the Spanish football cup competition. The match took place on 18 April 1905 at the Hipódromo, Madrid. The match was contested by Athletic Bilbao and Madrid CF. Madrid CF lifted the trophy for the first time with a 1–0 victory over Athletic Bilbao. ==Match details== http://www.linguasport.com/FUTBOL/nacional/copa/cup.htm {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"|ATHLETIC BILBAO: |- !width=200| !!width=200| |- | Prado |- | Hermenegildo García |- | J.
